Edward Charles Bowers (December 15, 1845 â€“ January 19, 1929) was a Canadian politician, teacher and trader. Born in Westport, Colony of Nova Scotia, he was elected to the House of Commons of Canada in 1891 as a Member of the Liberal Party to represent the riding of Digby. He was acclaimed in 1892.
